# Test: grove list --filter dirty,locked uses OR logic
setup_workspace develop feature/test

exec grove add develop
exec grove add feature/test
# make develop dirty - main is already locked (auto-lock)
exec sh -c 'echo "dirty" > ../develop/dirty.txt'
exec grove list --filter dirty,locked --plain
stdout 'develop'
stdout 'main'
! stdout 'feature-test'
stderr 'Gathering worktree status'
